TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Edgar_Lungu, title = Edgar_Lungu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edgar_Lungu} }

S.FORM: I 1956 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 11 a romi'ad masofoc ci Edgar Lungu , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Zambia anini i ci Edgar Lungu, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 25 a romi'ad.

I 1956 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 11 a romi'ad masofoc ci Edgar Longo , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Zambia anini i ci Edgar Longo, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 25 a romi'ad.
